title: Neruppae Sikki Mukki Lyrics Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
stanzas:
neruppu sikki mukki neruppu
mayakki sokki sokki mayakki

nerupae neruppe
sikki mukki neruppae
idhamaa oththadam kodupen
medhuvaa sokki sokki
mayakki madiyil paduppen

dhinamum unna unna nenachi
udambu kuchiyaa ilachchen
kanavil etti etti paarthaen
athanaal polachen

megam megam
thooram pogattum
pogum podhe
thooral podattum
megam megam
thooram pogattum
pogum podhe
thooral podum

nerupae neruppe
sikki mukki neruppae
idhamaa oththadam kodupen
medhuvaa sokki sokki
mayakki madiyil paduppen

dhinamum unna unna nenachi
udambu kuchiyaa ilachchen
kanavil etti etti paarthaen
athanaal polachen

mazhaiye mazhaiye
en mele vandhu vilavaa vilavaa
veyile veyile un vervai
valaiyai virithidavaa

paniye paniye en paayil
konjam paduvaa paduvaa
idhazhoram sirippi pirakkiradhe
pudhusaaga yedhayo nenachu

nerupae neruppe
sikki mukki neruppae
idhamaa oththadam kodupen
medhuvaa sokki sokki
mayakki madiyil paduppen

dhinamum unna unna nenachi
udambu kuchiyaa ilachchen
kanavil etti etti paarthaen
athanaal polachen

sagiye sagiye
sallaabathaerin maniye maniye
radhiye radhiye
un iraavil naanum
nulaindhidavaa

kaniye kaniye
en naavil undhan
rushiye rushiye
viralodu viralgal irugiduthe
mahathodu nadanam thodangum

nerupae neruppe
sikki mukki neruppae
idhamaa oththadam kodupen
medhuvaa sokki sokki
mayakki madiyil paduppen

dhinamum unna unna nenachi
udambu kuchiyaa ilachchen
kanavil etti etti paarthaen
athanaal polachen

megam megam
thooram pogattum
pogum podhe
thooral podattum

thooram pogattum
pogum podhe
thooral podattum
